definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: If Ross fell asleep, the baby's mother whipped her.
sentences.chinese: 假如蘿絲不慎睡著了，嬰兒的媽媽會鞭笞她。

sentences.english: The little Love-god lying once asleep.
sentences.chinese: 小小愛神有一次呼呼地睡著。

sentences.english: Waking or sleeping, Thy presence my light.
sentences.chinese: 睡著或睡醒，慈容是我光。

definition: to have one's eyes on (a goal)/having sth in mind/to concentrate
to dream/to have a dream/fig. illusion/fantasy/pipe dream
to rouse/to be woken by sth/to wake with a start/to sleep lightly
it's not important/it's nothing/never mind/to have nothing to do/to be free/to be all right (out of danger or trouble)
a moment/a while/in a moment/now...now.../also pr. [yi1 hui3 r5]
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
to be off in another world/to suffer a lapse in concentration
